goctls.short: A cli tool to generate go-zero code

dart.short: Generate dart files for provided api in api file

format.stdin: Use stdin to input api doc content, press "ctrl + d" to send EOF
format.declare: Use to skip check api types already declare

go.short: Generate go files for provided api in api file
go.extra_field: Whether to generate extra fields for logic, such as userId

new.module_name: The module name in go.mod. e.g. github.com/suyuan32/simple-admin-core
new.ent: Whether to use Ent in API service
new.use_core_rpc: Whether to use "CoreRpc", if true will generate "CoreRpc" configuration

proto.short: Generate CRUD template from proto file
proto.model: Model name used for generation, the same as the struct name in schema. such as User, supports generating multiple models at the same time, separated by commas, such as User, Member
proto.search_key_num: The max number of search keys
proto.rpc_name: The rpc name in service context. e.g. Core means CoreRpc
proto.grpc_package: The rpc package which stores pb file. e.g. github.com/suyuan32/simple-admin-job/types/job
proto.multiple: Whether the proto contains multiple services
proto.json_style: The JSON tag format, default is camelcase
proto.overwrite: Whether to overwrite the files, it will overwrite all generated files
proto.optional_service: Whether it is an optional service, if true, judgment code will be generated
proto.api_data: Whether to automatically generate API initialization code, CoreRpc is required

ent.short: Generate CRUD logic files from ent file
ent.schema: The schema path of the Ent
ent.model: The model name for generating, the same as the struct name in schema. e.g. User. If it is  "all", generate codes for all models in schema directory
ent.search_key_num: The max number of search keys
ent.group: The group name for logic. e.g. user
ent.overwrite: Whether to overwrite the files, it will overwrite all generated files
ent.json_style: The JSON tag format, default is camelcase
ent.api_data: Whether to automatically generate API initialization code, CoreRpc is required

docker.author: The author information
docker.service_name: The service name of the project
docker.service_type: The service type, such as rpc, api
docker.base: The base image to run the project
docker.port: The port to expose, default none
docker.tz: The timezone of the container, such as Asia/Shanghai
docker.china: If your server in China, set true
docker.local_build: Whether to build the project locally without using intermediate images

deploy.name: The name of deployment (required)
deploy.secret: The secret to image pull from registry
deploy.replicas: The number of replicas to deploy
deploy.revisions: The number of revision history to limit
deploy.port: The port of the deployment to listen on pod (required)
deploy.nodePort: The nodePort of the deployment to expose
deploy.targetPort: The targetPort of the deployment, default to port
deploy.imagePullPolicy: The image pull policy of the deployment, default to IfNotPresent

check.short: Detect goctl env and dependency tools

gateway.short: gateway is a tool to generate gateway code

protoc.short: generate gateway code from proto file

protoset.short: generate gateway code from protoset file

server.short: generate gateway code from grpc server

new.module_name: The module name in go.mod. e.g. github.com/suyuan32/simple-admin-core
new.desc: Whether to create desc folder for splitting proto files

protoc.multiple: Generated in multiple rpc service mode

ent.short: Generate CRUD template codes by Ent
ent.schema: The schema path of the Ent
ent.multiple: Generated in multiple rpc service mode
ent.model: The model name for generating, the same as the struct name in schema. e.g. User. If it is  "all", generate codes for all models in schema directory
ent.search_key_num: The max number of search keys
ent.group: The group name for logic. e.g. user
ent.overwrite: Whether to overwrite the files, it will overwrite all generated files

extra.short: Provide extra command, such as i18n, init code

i18n.target: The target type, now only support api
i18n.model_name: The model name, it should be camelcase, such as StudentInfo
i18n.model_name_zh: The model name's Chinese translation, such as 学生信息

init_code.target: The target type, now support core and other
init_code.model_name: The model name, it should be camelcase, such as StudentInfo
init_code.output: The output path, the project's root directory
init_code.route_prefix: The prefix of the route path

template.dir: The ent directory. If it is empty, goctls will try to find it automatically

mixin.dir: Directory of ent. If empty, goctls will find it automatically

import.dsn:
Database DSN address, supports mysql and postgres. e.g. "mysql://user:pass@tcp(localhost:3306)/dbname"
"postgres://user:pass@host:port/dbname?sslmode=disable"
import.exclude_tables: When excluding tables for exporting all tables, you need to specify all intermediate tables and tables without a primary key. For example: role_menu, user_roles
import.output: Output path, the project's root directory

makefile.dir: Directory where the makefile file is located.
makefile.service_type: Service type: api, single, or rpc.

proto2api.short: Generate additional data for API, such as type and service, through proto
proto2api.api_path: API file path. If it is empty, the output will be displayed on the console
proto2api.proto_path: Proto file path. Note that it is the proto file in the root directory, not in the desc folder
proto2api.model_name: Model name used for filtering RPC
proto2api.group_name: Group name. If it is empty, it will be the lowercase of the model name
proto2api.multiple: Whether it is a proto for multiple services
proto2api.json_style: The format of the JSON fields, defaulting to goZero

view_log.path: Log file path. If a configuration file path is provided, the corresponding file will be read directly
view_log.workspace_setting: Configure workspace data. After configuration, the workspace directory can be saved and read by name, and must be used with the log_type parameter. The format is "name,directory"
view_log.size: Number of messages to display. The default is 10, displayed in reverse order
view_log.log_type: Log Type. Use with "workspace" param. Support error, stat, access, severe, slow
view_log.delete_config: Delete configuration, enter configuration name, separate multiple configurations with commas, for example "core, fms"

cicd.short: Continuous integration and continuous delivery configuration file generating, such as drone ci and gitlab ci

drone.author: ctra-wangdada
drone.go_private: Go private such as: gitee.com|github.com, default "gitee.com" (required)
drone.service_name: The service name of the main project go file, such as: core.go, you must ignore suffix: .go  (required)
drone.service_type: The service type such as: rpc|api, default "happy"
drone.registry: The remote Docker Registry, if aliyun ACR such as: registry.cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com (required)
drone.git_branch: The branch of the remote repo, default "main"
drone.repo: The remote Git Repository, if tag is not 'latest' please assign tag such as: git-repo:v0.0.1, if tag is latest you can ignore the tag (required)
drone.etc_yaml: The Dockerfile with drone used, go-zero project etc yaml file name (required)

gitlab.short: Generate gitlab-ci.yml file to build docker images

gitea.short: Generate actions files for gitea to build docker images
gitea.output_dir: The output directory, please set the project's root directory
gitea.china: Whether the server is located in China
gitea.repository: The address of the code repository, for example, "https://github.com/suyuan32/simple-admin-job.git"

template.home: The goctl home path of the template

update.short: Update template of the target category to the latest

revert.short: Revert the target template to the latest
revert.name: The target file name of template

project.short: Project management related commands, such as project upgrade

vben.output: The output directory, it should be the root directory of simple admin backend ui
vben.api_file: The absolute path of api file
vben.folder_name: The folder name to generate file in different directory. e.g. file folder in simple admin backend ui which is to store file manager service files
vben.sub_folder: The sub folder name. e.g. src/views/sys sub folder user which path is src/views/sys/user
vben.prefix: The request prefix for proxy. e.g. sys-api
vben.overwrite: Whether to overwrite the files, it will overwrite all generated files

info.short: View additional information, such as environment variables and project port usage.

env.service_name: Service name, support: core, fms, mcms
env.list: Show the list of supported services

global.home: The goctls home path of the template, --home and --remote cannot be set at the same time, if they are, --remote has higher priority
global.remote:
The remote git repo of the template, --home and --remote cannot be set at the same time, if they are, --remote has higher priority
The git repo directory must be consistent with the https://github.com/zeromicro/go-zero-template directory structure
global.branch: The branch of the remote repo, it does work with --remote
global.import_prefix: Import paths' prefix is only used when the service in sub folder, such as core service's api and rpc
